thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com
thread.title: Johnny Krongos
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Johnny Krongos

author: Johnny Krongos
title: Johnny Krongos
text:
I had moved after the first of the month and I had already placed my order. I was worried I wasn't going to receive it. I contacted LTB as soon as possible, once Britni handled my problem I new customer service was top notch. She responded very fast and helped every step of the way thank you. I was worried cause I was not able to call but Britni handled the situation like a pro. Thanks again LTB i will be a long time customer.
Johnny Krongos
